io.janusproject.kernel.bic

Interface InternalEventBusCapacity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.sarl.lang.core.Capacity

    public interface InternalEventBusCapacity
extends io.sarl.lang.core.Capacity
    Capacity that provides an event bus to notify the different components of an agent.

    This capacity is provided by the Janus kernel, not SARL.

    Version:
    2.0.3.0 2015-11-30 17:37:13
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  InternalEventBusCapacity.OwnerState
      Describe the states of the owner of an event bus.

      Replies the state of the owner of the event bus.

      • selfEvent

        void selfEvent(io.sarl.lang.core.Event event)
        Sends an event to itself using its defaultInnerAddress as source. Used for platform level event dispatching (i.e. Initialize and Destroy)
        Parameters:
        event - - event to propagate into the agent.
